claim.text: Our JMRI framework first performs feature alignment in a common semantic space learned by CLIP.
claim.location: II. Related Work, B. Image–Text Foundation Model
claim.exact_quote: Different from the existing works applying independent feature extraction and then fusion, our framework first performs feature alignment in a common semantic space learned by CLIP.

evidence.evidence_text: Different from the existing works applying independent feature extraction and then fusion, our framework first performs feature alignment in a common semantic space learned by CLIP.
evidence.location: II. Related Work, B. Image–Text Foundation Model
evidence.exact_quote: Different from the existing works applying independent feature extraction and then fusion, our framework first performs feature alignment in a common semantic space learned by CLIP.

claim.text: By freezing the pretrained CLIP and updating the other modules, we achieve the best performance with the least training budget and deployment cost.
claim.exact_quote: By freezing the pretrained CLIP and updating the other modules, we achieve the best performance with the least training budget and deployment cost.

evidence.evidence_text: By freezing the pretrained CLIP and updating the other modules, we achieve the best performance with the least training budget and deployment cost.
evidence.exact_quote: By freezing the pretrained CLIP and updating the other modules, we achieve the best performance with the least training budget and deployment cost.

evaluation.key_limitations: the performance of the model might suffer when using a different dataset
